meaningMnemonic: A <radical>turkey</radical> sitting on a <radical>stool</radical> is something every ship has in its crow's nest. That's why the universal <kanji>ship counter</kanji> is a turkey on a stool. Not a crow.
readingMnemonic: Once you become the best <kanji>ship counter</kanji> in the world everyone will think you are super <reading>sexy</reading> (せき)! Nothing is sexier than being able to count, and counting ships is the sexiest thing you can count.
